legend_0010_friend_01: Oh, hey. So we meet again![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_02a:
Yeah, exactly! That’s my little know-it-all buddy!
Got a mind like a steel trap, eh?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_02b:
What?! Come on, I gave you [VAR PKNAME(0001)]’s
Poké Ball! Did I forget to introduce myself...?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]No need to tell me your name.
[VAR TRNAME(0000)], right?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_05:
Whole school seems to be talking about you.\c
The new kid who showed up with the president
of the student council.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_06:
I normally wouldn’t even bother showing up for
class, but I came all the way to school today\r
just to talk with you—our new celebrity.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_07:
You’ve gotta help me out so I can finally make
my dream a reality![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_08:
What kind of little maniac says yes to something
without even knowing what they’re agreeing to?![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_09:
Hehehe... Caught your interest, have I? You want
to hear all about my dream, right?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_10:
Well, this might come as a surprise, but fact is,
I’m all about that picnic life: the great outdoors,\r
the perfectly prepared sandwiches, all of it.\c
Not half bad at cooking either, I can tell you.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_11:
Right now I’m researching new recipes that’ll help
Pokémon feel better. Real health food, see.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_12:
I found this book the other day, and it had a
section about these Herba Mystica things...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_13:
Basically, they’re some kind of special herbs that
heal up any Pokémon as soon as it eats them![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_14:
Now, there are a total of five different types of
Herba Mystica, based on what I read.\c
Just taking a little lick of them once they’ve been
powdered will get your blood flowing, provide\r
nutrients, prevent aging—it’ll even boost the\r
immune system![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_15:
These herbs seem like they’re the real deal.
Only found here in Paldea—and rare to boot![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_16:
But this book says they’re all guarded by Titan
Pokémon, meaning that it’s gonna be pretty\r
tough to try to grab even a few sprigs.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_24:
’Cause, see, Titans are— Well, I think they’ve
gotta be...things like this![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_17:
I really want to get those herbs for myself, but...
I’m not very good at Pokémon battles.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_18:
Don’t have any friends with strong Pokémon to
lend me a hand, either...\c
And I’d never hear the end of it if I went crawling
to that student council girl...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_19:
But here you waltz up! You’ve got to help me out
with this—you’d be perfect![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_20: Nope! Wait! I don’t need an answer yet![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_23:
I’ll just register the places where it seems there
might be Titans in your map app for you.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_21:
Let it stew a bit, and we can get more into the
details later. And in the meantime...take this.\r
A little gift for listening and all.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0010_friend_22: Give the idea some serious thought! Please![VAR 0114(0006)]
